title: High ping (help)
body:
I had 52 -65 ms yesterday and now i played BF 4 got good 55 ms played revelation had good ms and now i got 196 to 246 ms, ping tested a lot of ip's euw lol ping 104.160.141.3(196-245)ms
and a random nl ip 176.56.238.3(56-72)ms
8.8.8.8(min 22-38ms)
tested alot other ip s dont know wtf i gues ust not playin lol ? bb?
Playing from latvia, internet provider (LMT) 4G Mobile

replies.body:
The routing you used is for the NA region so you're certainly see a higher ping.  You'll want to route directly to EUW:  192.64.170.252

Using 4G is not really optimal, so you can certainly run into some problems like packet loss.  Our [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) can help verify this.

If you run into hiccups before reaching riotdirect, then our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help with troubleshooting but that 4G may be the culprit.  Let me know if that clears things up!
